If you want to print runtime information during execution, enter 1. If not, enter 0.
0











----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
ROUTER TEST
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Simulates receiving an IPv4packet, routing it through a lookup table using principle of longestmatch.
Table is hardcoded in router constructor.


Forwarding table:
dest									mask		interface
00000000.00000000.00000000.00000000		0			interface 1
00000001.00000010.00000011.00000100		8			interface 2
00000001.00000010.00000011.00000100		16			interface 3
00000001.00000010.00000011.10000000		25			interface 4

packet 			11111111.11111111.11111111.11111111
routed to		00000000.00000000.00000000.00000000		0			interface 1

packet 			00000001.00000001.00000011.00000100
routed to		00000001.00000010.00000011.00000100		8			interface 2

packet 			00000001.00000011.00000011.00000100
routed to		00000001.00000010.00000011.00000100		8			interface 2

packet 			00000001.00000010.00000100.00000100
routed to		00000001.00000010.00000011.00000100		16			interface 3

packet 			00000001.00000010.00000011.10101010
routed to		00000001.00000010.00000011.10000000		25			interface 4











----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
SWITCH TEST
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Simulates receiving anEthernet frame, forwarding it through a lookup table.
Table isinitially empty, builds up as packets travel through the switch.


Switch table: table is empty


Attempting to forward 11111111.11111111.11111111.11111111.11111111.11111111 from interface 1
no entry found for frame 11111111.11111111.11111111.11111111.11111111.11111111
Switch table:
MAC address													interface
11111111.11111111.11111111.11111111.11111111.11111111		1


Attempting to forward 00000001.00000001.00000011.00000100.00000101.00000110 from interface 2
no entry found for frame 00000001.00000001.00000011.00000100.00000101.00000110
frame 			00000001.00000001.00000011.00000100.00000101.00000110
broadcast to	11111111.11111111.11111111.11111111.11111111.11111111		1
Switch table:
MAC address													interface
11111111.11111111.11111111.11111111.11111111.11111111		1
00000001.00000001.00000011.00000100.00000101.00000110		2


Attempting to forward 00000001.00000001.00000011.00000100.00000101.00000110 from interface 1
frame 			00000001.00000001.00000011.00000100.00000101.00000110
forwarded to		00000001.00000001.00000011.00000100.00000101.00000110		2
Switch table:
MAC address													interface
11111111.11111111.11111111.11111111.11111111.11111111		1
00000001.00000001.00000011.00000100.00000101.00000110		2


Attempting to forward 00000001.00000011.00000011.00000100.00000101.00000110 from interface 3
no entry found for frame 00000001.00000011.00000011.00000100.00000101.00000110
frame 			00000001.00000011.00000011.00000100.00000101.00000110
broadcast to	11111111.11111111.11111111.11111111.11111111.11111111		1
frame 			00000001.00000011.00000011.00000100.00000101.00000110
broadcast to	00000001.00000001.00000011.00000100.00000101.00000110		2
Switch table:
MAC address													interface
11111111.11111111.11111111.11111111.11111111.11111111		1
00000001.00000001.00000011.00000100.00000101.00000110		2
00000001.00000011.00000011.00000100.00000101.00000110		3


Attempting to forward 00000001.00000011.00000011.00000100.00000101.00000110 from interface 3
Output interface matches input interface.
Discarding frame 00000001.00000011.00000011.00000100.00000101.00000110
Switch table:
MAC address													interface
11111111.11111111.11111111.11111111.11111111.11111111		1
00000001.00000001.00000011.00000100.00000101.00000110		2
00000001.00000011.00000011.00000100.00000101.00000110		3



Process finished with exit code 0
